variables.name: Income
variables.description: Total taxable income for tax calculation.

variables.name: Bracket_1
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 1: 5.35% on the portion of income up to $32,570. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_2
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 2: 6.80% on the portion of income over $32,570 up to $106,990. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_3
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 3: 7.85% on the portion of income over $106,990 up to $198,630. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_4
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 4: 9.85% on the portion of income over $198,630. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: FinalTaxes
variables.description: Sum of Bracket_1 through Bracket_4 in numerical order. Includes zeros from brackets that do not apply. Calculation must always add all four brackets explicitly.

rules.translation: FinalTaxes is greater or equal to 0
